content:
Hi guys! :D

Roc's every.org page (https://www.every.org/roc-programming-language-foundation) link to https://foundation.roc-lang.org/, which seems to be dead. Probably a bug?
We just moved our DNS stuff to cloudflare, so that is very likely the cause. Thank you so much for reporting this @Prokop Randacek! I'll look into fixing it right away.
Anton has marked this topic as resolved.
